info: In Iceland, you need to be an Icelandic citizen in order to buy homes. However, an American can request permission from the embassy to buy property and it is usually granted. It is less likely to be granted for businesses seeking to build over the land and more likely to be granted for people who want to be homeowners.
In Thailand, you are not permitted to buy a home if you are not a citizen.
